Articles.Content:
As the name suggest this challenge is about making the smallest craft possible to accomplish the mission.

**The mission:**

- Takeoff from KSC
- Land ship and plant flags on Mun and Minmus
- Return all Crew safely to Kerbin

**Scoring:**

There will be three categories (with separate scoreboards) to compete in.

1. **Lightweight**. (Mass)
2. **Simple.** (Part count)
3. **Cheap.** (Cost)

**Additional rules:**

- No cheating, including alt-f12, HyperEdit, or config file editing.
- No part-clipping. No clipping of functional parts (fuel tanks, batteries, crew pods, engines, science parts, SAS) into each other. It is okay to clip structural and non-functional parts.
- Weight/part count is counted before launch from KSC. Multiple launches are allowed, Sum up wight/parts/cost of all launches. All launches helping the mission must be counted.
- No use of unbalanced mods
- No mining on Kerbin.
- Use at least normal difficulty on relevant settings

**Scoreboards:**

**Lightweight:**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-10T13:22:38Z" title="08/10/2015 01:22  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 10, 2015</time> by Nefrums**

I think my pro SSTO build can do this but at the same time I want to design something new lol I will be trying this later ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I was planing to posting my own entry today, but i miscalculated the dv required. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif) Will have to try again tomorrow.
I assume you mean starting from the KSC?
Yes. That is correct
How do you score reusable craft on "cheap"? Just count fuel costs, or what?

As fun as it is to design SSTOs, I don't want to make the "cheap" Category a SSTO only category.

So recovery funds are not part of this challenge.
BAH you screwed me lol I was just tweaking my design costing about 5k after recovery. Oh well it will still probably be a contender for light weight.

Here's a rocket entry to get the challenge started.

***The M&M #1*** **** 

It weighs 62.083t, costs 131,042 and has 72 parts. 

It may not be the lightest possible but it looks goooood!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/9P2ax)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-27T14:43:33Z" title="07/27/2015 02:43  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 27, 2015</time> by Foxster**
That is a nice little Mun lander. Question those are fuel cell arrays correct? Do they contain fuel? I dont see where else it could be coming from.

That is one nice looking ship!

Cool that you used ion booster on the last stage.

Here is my own entry with a space plane. more going for lowest mass than the other two.

Moonhopper:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/wzB0e)

mass: 16,7t

parts: 23

cost: 21936

> 
> That is a nice little Mun lander. Question those are fuel cell arrays correct? Do they contain fuel? I dont see where else it could be coming from.

Yes, they are fuel cell arrays. The fuel for them comes from the Round-8 tanks.

Bah you blew my 27t monstrosity out of the water and for 1/2 the cost and 1/3 the parts.........

Back to the drawing board lol

- - - Updated - - -

Oh I see I thought that was a visual mod z1k

> 
> Here is my own entry with a space plane. more going for lowest mass than the other two.
>

>

Nice one!

Did you want to consider separate winged and rocket leader boards? Its just that the only craft that are going to be anywhere near winning the current categories are spaceplanes/SSTOs. Kinda fun to encourage folks to do it with rockets too.

I kind of figured that the mass would be dominated by space planes, the parts one was for rockets, and the cost could be any of them?

But separate leader boards might be a better idee.
Ya with space planes hitting 50% payload and rockets only doing 28% they don't have a chance

Another day, another rocket.

*The M&M #2.*

Mass 37.062t, cost 19,716(!), parts 41.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/XR2LQ)
Nice one! Good to see that rockets can compete with space planes!

I love how the descriptive text says not meant for atmospheric landings yet everyone does this and it works just fine lol.

So my idea worked and failed at the same time. 10.9t 37,000 kredits 74 parts. I will post it after work so others can avoid my misfortune.

I have an entry for the "Simple" category, the Munmus.

Highlights:

- 84.6t, 25,825 funds, 9 parts
- Lifter stage used for Minmus injection
- Landed on Minmus and the Mun without landing gear
- Safe return of capsule to Kerbin
- [Craft file](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/1.0.4/Munmus/Munmus.craft) (all stock).

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/HHNoK)

If the LV-909 was any good in atmo I could have eliminated the pod decoupler and the parachute by doing a powered landing, and the other decoupler wasn't strictly necessary but I feel cheaty using an engine to decouple.

10.9 t 

32 parts

39,492 Kredits (whish I knew after recovered value)

descriptions are in the comments

I think I was attacked by the Kraken 10m from the runway and my last quick save was around the Mun. No desire to do that again since this is a failure anyways.

[**Spontanious break up**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130079-Spontanious-break-up)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/fNIcV)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-29T03:02:13Z" title="07/29/2015 03:02  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 29, 2015</time> by Nich**

My attempt was 10 parts, 39980kg, and 9754 cost. Planted flags on mun and minmus... and was stuck on minmus with 1m/s dV. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Maybe I'll try again tomorrow. Fun challenge.
Nice one Nich. The flag planting is more of a formality, intended to force maned flights.

Did it properly and optimised it a little.

8.6t

27 parts

34635 (recovered for 29918 so final cost that doesn't count is 4717 and I want an astric ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) )

Descriptions are in the comments I will post the craft if anyone wants

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/D9cPE)
Red crown I was trying to find your 9th part and couldnt for the life of me until I saw that 1 dam solar panel lol. I bet a million kerbals I would have forgotten that on a low part challenge lol
